reviewText: I love this film; very entertaining.  I had seen it a couple of times then decided to buy it.  It's light, relaxing; just good fun.

I love this movie.  I watched because of Lambert Wilson (who I adore) and it's one of my favorite movies.  Casting is great.  The chemistry between all the friends is wonderful. This is one of the movies I will watch frequently.
Great movie. Wonderful friends, gentle people, all food and wine connoiseurs.
